ai.summary: A short, easy 3.4 km hike in the United Kingdom designed for beginners and families. Dylan's Birthday Walk offers a gentle route with pleasant surroundings and a light celebratory vibe.
ai.terrain_summary: Mostly well maintained footpaths with gentle gradients. Expect some grassy sections and a few uneven patches; underfoot is generally easy for casual walkers.
ai.safety_notes: Plan ahead with a weather check and daylight planning. Wear sturdy footwear, stay on marked trails, and carry water. Keep a map or GPS handy, tell someone your route, and avoid hiking alone in remote areas. Be mindful of others and wildlife, and watch for uneven surfaces after rain.
ai.best_seasons: Year round in the UK, with best conditions in spring and summer.

seo.title: Dylan's Birthday Walk - Easy 3.4 km Hike in the UK
seo.meta_description: Discover Dylan's Birthday Walk, a short and easy 3.4 km hike in the UK. Family friendly terrain, safety tips, and gear recommendations.
